    Reading List

    Collection of books that I’ve found highly influencial in my reading history. You can find all my reading interests on Goodreads.

    Books read since 2016

    1. The Wealthy Barber Returns by Chilton, David

    2. Improv Wisdom: Don’t Prepare, Just Show Up by Madson, Patricia Ryan

    3. The Concise 48 Laws of Power by Greene, Robert

    4. So Good They Can’t Ignore You: Why Skills Trump Passion in the Quest for Work You Love by Newport, Cal

    5. Rising Strong by Brown, Brené

    6. How to Lie with Statistics by Huff, Darrell

    7. Braving the Wilderness: The Quest for True Belonging and the Courage to Stand Alone by Brown, Brené

    8. Wild Nights: Conversations with Mykonos about Passionate Love, Extraordinary Sex, and How to Open to God by Deida, David

    9. Civil War Stories by Bierce, Ambrose

    10. Letting Go: The Pathway To Surrender by Hawkins, David R.

    11. Meditations by Aurelius, Marcus

    12. Mindset: The New Psychology of Success by Dweck, Carol S.

    13. The Prince by Machiavelli, Niccolò

    14. 21 Lessons for the 21st Century by Harari, Yuval Noah

    15. Free Prize Inside!: The Next Big Marketing Idea by Godin, Seth

    16. Siddhartha by Hesse, Hermann

    17. Freedom from the Known by Krishnamurti, Jiddu

    18. Letters from a Self-Made Merchant to His Son by Lorimer, George

    19. Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion by Cialdini, Robert B.

    20. Greed, Sex, Intention: Living like a yogi in the 21st Century by Veda, Hannah Whittingham Marcus

    21. This book will teach you how to write better by Medhora, Neville

    22. The Laws of Spirit: A Tale of Transformation by Millman, Dan

    23. Breakthrough Copywriter: A Field Guide to Eugene M. Schwartz Advertising Genius by Worstell, Robert C.

    24. All Marketers Are Liars: The Power of Telling Authentic Stories in a Low-Trust World by Godin, Seth

    25. The Black Swan: The Impact of the Highly Improbable by Taleb, Nassim Nicholas

    26. The 48 Laws of Power by Greene, Robert

    27. The Science of Marketing: When to Tweet, What to Post, How to Blog, and Other Proven Strategies by Zarrella, Dan

    28. Los cinco niveles del apego by Ruiz, Miguel

    29. Los dones de la imperfección by Brown, Brené

    30. The Retreat of Western Liberalism by Luce, Edward

    31. The Art of War by Sun Tzu

    32. Franny and Zooey by Salinger, J.D.

    33. Enchantment: The Art of Changing Hearts, Minds, and Actions by Kawasaki, Guy

    34. Perennial Seller: The Art of Making and Marketing Work That Lasts by Holiday, Ryan

    35. On Fear by Krishnamurti, Jiddu

    36. Do the Work: Overcome Resistance and Get Out of Your Own Way by Pressfield, Steven

    37. Blue Truth: A Spiritual Guide to Life & Death and Love & Sex by Deida, David

    38. The Dip: A Little Book That Teaches You When to Quit by Godin, Seth

    39. The Score Takes Care of Itself: My Philosophy of Leadership by Walsh, Bill

    40. Endurance: Shackleton’s Incredible Voyage by Lansing, Alfred

    41. Ego Is the Enemy by Holiday, Ryan

    42. Email Persuasion: Captivate and Engage Your Audience, Build Authority and Generate More Sales With Email Marketing by Brodie, Ian

    43. Turning Pro by Pressfield, Steven

    44. The Warrior Ethos by Pressfield, Steven *

    45. The War of Art: Break Through the Blocks & Win Your Inner Creative Battles by Pressfield, Steven

    46. Daring Greatly: How the Courage to Be Vulnerable Transforms the Way We Live, Love, Parent, and Lead by Brown, Brené

    47. Start with Why: How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone to Take Action by Sinek, Simon

    48. No More Mr. Nice Guy by Glover, Robert A.

    49. On the Shortness of Life by Seneca

    50. The Art of Living: The Classical Manual on Virtue, Happiness and Effectiveness by Epictetus

    51. Radical Honesty : How to Transform Your Life by Telling the Truth by Blanton, Brad

    52. How to Win Friends and Influence People by Carnegie, Dale

    53. Finding God Through Sex: Awakening the One of Spirit Through the Two of Flesh by Deida, David

    54. The Power of Habit: Why We Do What We Do in Life and Business by Duhigg, Charles

    55. Dear Lover: A Woman’s Guide to Men, Sex, and Love’s Deepest Bliss by Deida, David

    56. The Way of the Superior Man: A Spiritual Guide to Mastering the Challenges of Women, Work, and Sexual Desireby by Deida, David

    57. Fooled by Randomness: The Hidden Role of Chance in Life and in the Markets by Taleb, Nassim Nicholas

    58. Slaughterhouse-Five by Vonnegut, Kurt

    59. On Love and Loneliness by Krishnamurti, Jiddu

    60. Antifragile: Things That Gain from Disorder by Taleb, Nassim Nicholas

    61. The Obstacle Is the Way: The Timeless Art of Turning Trials into Triumph by Holiday, Ryan

    62. Debt: The First 5,000 Years by Graeber, David

    63. Growth Hacker Marketing: A Primer on the Future of PR, Marketing, and Advertising by Holiday, Ryan

    64. The Science of Selling: Proven Strategies to Make Your Pitch, Influence Decisions, and Close the Deal by Hoffeld, David
